summary: The story of American poet Emily Dickinson from her early days as a young schoolgirl to her later years as a reclusive, unrecognized artist.
cast: Emma Bell|Sara Vertongen|Rose Williams|Benjamin Wainwright|Keith Carradine|Marieke Bresseleers|David Van Bouwel|Annette Badland|Steve Dan Mills|Joanna Bacon|Daniel Vereenooghe|Michel Delanghe|Maurice Cassiers|Duncan Duff|Jennifer Ehle|Cynthia Nixon|Catherine Bailey|Miles Richardson|Luc Devos|Barney Glover|Jodhi May|Verona Verbakel|Yasmin Dewilde|Turlough Convery|Daan Cools|Eve Cools|Eric Loren|Simone Milsdochter|Tom Kemp|Ross MacDonald|Trevor Cooper|Stefan Menaul|Bert Bancquaert|Richard Wells|Noémie Schellens|Maarten Ketels|Barry Roberts|Paul Bellefeuille|Ella Holland|Olivier|Dorian Salkin

title: Historia de una pasión
